import React from 'react' import 'bulma/css/bulma.min.css'; import { useState } from 'react'; import { withRouter } from 'react-router'; export default function SignUpForm(props) { const [userInfo, setUserInfo] = useState({ name:'', password:'', username:'', quote:'' }) const handleChange = (event) => { setUserInfo({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value }) } const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() props.signUp(userInfo) } console.log(userInfo) return (
